price: E aqueles, os quais fora concedido o Livro, não se separaram senão após haver-lhes chegado a evidente prova.
arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wamā tafarraqa alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba illā min baʿdi mā jāathumu al-bayinatu
